value.latex:
D\'{e}terminer $ \max\limits_{\left| z\right| \leq 1}\left| \sin z\right| .$
On rappelle que : $\sin z=\frac{e^{iz}-e^{-iz}}{2i}. $
value.html: Déterminer \(\max\limits_{\left| z\right| \leq 1}\left| \sin z\right| .\) On rappelle que : \(\sin z=\frac{e^{iz}-e^{-iz}}{2i}.\)
